Works

Orion

Generative experiment made in collaboration with fellow creative coder Thibaut Foussard.

Disintegrator

Mesh disintegration lab, using tesselation and simplex noise.

Textformer

Javascript utility for easy text animations and transitions, based on random character changes.

Vesuna

I really like building generative applications. However, when there is a wide range of possible outputs it can become tedious to save/restore and share specific settings.

To solve this issue, I wrote this tiny text-based random seed PRNG utility, that allow to generate pseudorandom number sequences based on simple words or word combinations.

About

Hello!

My name is Pierre "Keda" Aud√©oud. I'm a 38-year-old french creative coder from Paris, France.

My work is mostly made using three.js and vanilla javascript, with a strong focus on motion, randomness and interactivity. I also really like GLSL and sci-fi aesthetics.

I am currently looking for a creative studio of like-minded people, to craft beautiful things with.
